description: Database management system and ecommerce site

content.title: Process
content.detail: For the Information Management Systems Capstone Content. This capstone project was for a bookshop in need of marketability to customers. I compiled and organized data for the inventory, developed ER Models and schemas for the database, created sitemaps and schematics for a storyboard of wireframes for the bookshop's new website, and populated and configured both the database and the website in order to automate invoices, customer communication, and inventory findability and purchasability.

images.alt: Wireframe of bookshop website checkout form
Entity-Relationship diagram for bookshop database, including customers, books, and orders
Bookshop webiste sitemap to show site's information architecture
